home_page.phrase_1: Padel, tennis and pickleball club management
home_page.phrase_1_b: Easily and efficiently manage your racket sports club.
home_page.phrase_2: Register your members and allow them to book courts independently, without having to worry about the management. Create your leagues and tournaments by automatically assigning squares, days, courts and schedules. You will also be able to register your monitors and assign them timetables on the courts in a quick and organised way. You will also have a virtual wallet for players who want to forget about carrying their money with them. Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
home_page.phrase_3: Easy way to book courts. Your partners can also book without disturbing you.
home_page.phrase_4: You can create the leagues and just enter the results. The rest is up to us.
home_page.phrase_5: Create your tournaments and matches will be scheduled automatically based on court and player availability.
home_page.phrase_7b: You can access each of them to check schedules, explore available services, book courts, find specialized instructors for lessons, and view results. Additionally, you can sign up for tournaments and leagues organized by each club. Everything at your fingertips!
home_page.phrase_8: If you are a member you will be able to book your court free of charge from Weloveracket.
home_page.phrase_9: Enter the name of the club
home_page.phrase_10: Enter your club information. Also enter the courts you have and what sport they are. The functioning of the whole App will be dynamic and will depend on the type of sport of the courts.
home_page.phrase_11: Create fixed, recurring weekly or hourly bookings for your instructors. In addition, your members will be able to make their own bookings automatically.
home_page.phrase_12: You can create up to 5 types of tournaments depending on the number of pairs in each category. The schedules and courts where each participant will play will be automatically organised.
home_page.phrase_13: Create your club's leagues by entering only the pairs. weloverackeT will take care of the fixtures, rankings and will also show you statistics for each participant.
home_page.phrase_16: If you have any questions, ask us!
home_page.phrase_19: Email sent. We will contact you as soon as possible.
home_page.phrase_20: There was an error sending the email. Please try again in a few moments. If the problem persists, please contact us directly at
home_page.phrase_24: Sign up for WeLoveRacket for free and manage your racket sports clubs
home_page.phrase_25: Join WeLoveRacket at no cost and enjoy an easy and efficient way to manage your padel, tennis, or pickleball clubs. Add your favorite clubs and wait for approval, or check if they have already added you
home_page.phrase_26: Once you become a member or club player, you can:
home_page.phrase_27: Book courts for your matches easily and for free
home_page.phrase_28: Reserve courts for your padel, tennis, or pickleball matches quickly and autonomously at no cost. Simply find your club in the Clubs section and go to the Reservations area of the club.
home_page.phrase_30: Select the court and available time.
home_page.phrase_33: Cancellation policy: You can cancel your booking up to 12 hours before the match starts.
home_page.phrase_35: If you are unable to attend your match, you can easily cancel your booking.
home_page.phrase_36: You can cancel up to 12 hours before the start of the match.
home_page.phrase_38: Cancellations outside this period may be subject to penalties according to the club's rules.
home_page.phrase_39: Make sure you cancel in time so that other players can take advantage of the track.
home_page.phrase_40: To cancel, just log in to your club, go to the booking section and select the day and time you want to cancel by entering your username and password.
home_page.phrase_41: Sign up for your club's leagues and tournaments
home_page.phrase_42: Do you love competition and enjoy sports? Don't miss the chance to join the leagues and tournaments organized by your sports club! Whether you're a beginner or a pro, our competitions are designed for all skill levels. Signing up is quick and easy, and it’s the best way to experience the thrill of sports while having fun and making new friends.
home_page.phrase_43: Don't wait any longer—be part of the action!
home_page.phrase_44: Do You Play Padel, Tennis, or Pickleball? Or Are You a Coach?
